description: Application for revised description and approval of reserved matters (Condition 1) being appearance, landscaping, layout and scale, together with details of Conditions 7 (services and drains for services), 9 (materials and finishes), 15 (contaminated land), 16 (finished floor levels), 17(noise attenuation measures), 19 (wheelchair accommodation), 20 (surface water drainage), 21 (foul water drainage), 22 (landscape management plan), 23 (bird and bat nesting boxes) following outline planning application ref. 17/00577/OUTM for the for the development of the site to provide 60 residential dwellings comprising 30 houses and 30 flats with associated infrastructure and retention and enhancement of adjacent open space.
